list_translation_mean.translate_mean: sóng đập lên phía sau tàu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the aftermost and highest deck of a ship, especially in a sailing ship where it typically forms the roof of a cabin in the stern.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: there on the poop stood Captain Meech
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ở đó trên Poop đứng đội trưởng Meech

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a wave) break over the stern of (a ship), sometimes causing it to capsize.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: carrying a high sea, we were badly pooped
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: mang một biển cao, chúng tôi đã bị ị
